import React from 'react' class Block extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } componentDidMount() { this.props.fetchBlock(this.props.match.params.block_hash) } render() { const { current_block } = this.props if (Object.entries(current_block).length === 0) return null; debugger return (

Block #{current_block.height}

Summary

Number of Transaction

{current_block.n_tx}

{/*

Height

{current_block.height}

Timestamp

{current_block.time}

Time Received

{current_block.received_time}

Relayed By

{current_block.replayed_by}

Bits

{current_block.bits}

Size

{current_block.size}

Version

{current_block.ver}

Nonce

{current_block.nonce}

Nonce

{current_block.tx}

*/}
{/*

Hash

{current_block.hash}

Prev Block

{current_block.prev_block}

Next Block(s)

{current_block.next_block}

Merkle Root

{current_block.mrkl_root}

*/}
) } } export default Block
